title: prpr
summary: prpr is a very very simple slide-show watch face on a android wear.
description: prpr is a very very simple slide-show watch face on a android wear.The prpr's default is only display five images every 10 seconds, but you can transfer and show any favorite image to your android wear from companion application.*** The transferring picture is recommended square size, because prpr-companion application automatically resizes it to fit as a square size wallpaper.
descriptionHTML:
prpr is a very very simple slide-show watch face on a android wear.

The prpr's default is only display five images every 10 seconds, but you can transfer and show any favorite image to your android wear from companion application.

*** The transferring picture is recommended square size, because prpr-companion application automatically resizes it to fit as a square size wallpaper.
recentChanges: Allows enhanced number of pictures, more than 200.
